data.title: The Palm Restaurant
data.meta_description: The Palm Restaurant is located in Washington DC near the famous Dupont Circle. Featuring prime aged steak & seafood dishes. Join us for lunch or dinner!
data.text:
Hours & Location

1225 19th Street NW,

Washington, DC 20036

(202) 293-9091

SUN: 4:00 PM - 9:00 PM

MON - THU: 11:30 AM - 9:00 PM

FRI: 11:30 AM - 10:00 PM

SAT: 5:00 PM - 10:00 PM

Happy Hour Available Sunday - Friday, 4:00 - 6:30 PM

Order Online

Event CateringGrubhubDoorDashCaviarPostmatesUberEats

Additional Information

Located in the heart of the nation’s capital, The Palm Washington DC is a culinary institution. This unique location is just steps away from the White House, National Mall, and Smithsonian Museums. Reserve your table today to enjoy a dining experience that blends timeless elegance with modern sophistication.

Open for Dine-In

Make Reservations

View Menus Features Book a Private Event

Whatever Your Mood

Whether you’re looking for a relaxing cocktail at our beautiful bar, craving a generous steak with the perfect glass of wine, or planning a special party for an upcoming milestone, we have all this and more waiting for you at The Palm.

Learn Our Story

Catering

Planning your next event has never been so easy, or delicious! The Palm now offers online ordering for all of your event catering needs! Placing an order is just a few clicks away. Build your order, checkout and let us take care of the rest!

Learn More
